casebody.data:
Hillsborough,

Dec. 1, 1903. Warren, Assignee, v. Kenworthy & a. Joseph W. Fellows, for the plaintiff. John P. Bartlett, for the defendants.

Debt, on bond. Judgment was ordered by the superior court, Young, J., upon the report of a referee, who found a breach of the condition of the bond and assessed the plaintiff’s damages. To the order of judgment the defendants excepted.

Exception overruled.
